title: Show 68 - Professor Anand Menon
itunes:title: Show 68 - Professor Anand Menon
itunes:subtitle: Professor Anand Menon Forget every other discusâ€¦
description:
Professor Anand Menon Forget every other discussion you've heard about Brexit because Professor Anand Menon is going to explain it all. In this engrossing dissection of modern British politics, the professor of European Politics and Foreign Affairs at Kings College doesn't just put the debate into a fascinating context, he also delivers various bolts of positivity and some brilliant facts. Just when you thought you were fed up of Brexit, Anand will reawaken the excitement of it all. Vote for the Political Party here: https://www.britishpodcastawards.com/vote You can follow Anand here: @anandMenon1 You can follow Matt here: @mattforde Buy Anand's latest book here: https://www.amazon.co.uk/Brexit-British-Politics-Geoffrey-Evans/dp/1509523863/ref=sr_1_1?s=books&ie=UTF8&qid=1525266370&sr=1-1&keywords=anand+menon That discussion on the Bank of England and Spotify... http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/business-43960998 'Listen, Liberal' book available here: http://listenliberal.com

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
